flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This mag is a place where teens and tweens can freely design clothes for girls, boys, men, women, and babies, and show their own style trends.
guide.introduction_rendered: This mag is a place where teens and tweens can freely design clothes for girls, boys, men, women, and babies, and show their own style trends.
guide.summary: I post and design clothes for teens and tweens by me and other people.
guide.title: Soph-isticated design
